name: Moonlancer
description:
My game submission for the LowRez 2021 Game Jam.

Hunt down the most notorious criminals in the system as a bounty hunter, piloting your trusty ship. The Moonlancer is a special spacecraft that resonates with nearby moons, supercharging it's systems with unlimited energy. So if you see a moon, let loose your weapons on your unsuspecting criminal targets.

WASD - Move your ship

Left Mouse Click - Fire weapon(hold)

Right Mouse Click - Use Utility

Earn Bounty Tokens by completing bounties across the system. Use those tokens in the Hangar to unlock different weapons and utilities for your ship.

How to Download:

Just download the zip file and extract it to your desired location. Then simply run the Moonlancer.exe and enjoy! Please feel free to let me know what you think! I truly appreciate any feedback.

Credits

Brandon Parmelee - Game design/art/coding

Scott Kirkland - Music and SFX
